# Rmd Examples

This directory contains example R Markdown files for daltoolbox: modeling, visualization, and data preparation.

- [Classification](./classification/README.Rmd) — 8 examples (e.g., cla_dtree, cla_knn, cla_majority). Supervised classification algorithms and tuning.
- [Clustering](./clustering/README.Rmd) — 4 examples (e.g., clu_dbscan, clu_kmeans, clu_pam). Unsupervised clustering methods and model selection.
- [Graphics](./graphics/README.Rmd) — 17 examples (e.g., grf_bar_error, grf_bar, grf_boxplot). Chart examples with ggplot2 and helpers.
- [Regression](./regression/README.Rmd) — 6 examples (e.g., reg_dtree, reg_knn, reg_mlp). Supervised regression algorithms and tuning.
- [Transformations](./transf/README.Rmd) — 14 examples (e.g., categorical_mapping, curvature_maximum, curvature_minimum). Data preparation and transformation utilities.
